TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AnchorEditor extends System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor
Public NotInheritable Class AnchorEditor Inherits UITypeEditor
public ref class AnchorEditor sealed : System::Drawing::Design::UITypeEditor

Docs.summary: Provides a user interface for configuring an property.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.AnchorEditor> provides a design-time user interface for configuring an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A> property. An <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Anchor%2A> property is typically used to determine which sides of the container a control is bound to. This class provides a drop-down graphical control that allows the user to specify which sides of the container to anchor the control to.
## Examples The following code example uses an <xref:System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute> to associate the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.AnchorEditor> with a property.
[!code-cpp[EditorAttributesExample#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/EditorAttributesExample/CPP/class1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[EditorAttributesExample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/EditorAttributesExample/CS/class1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[EditorAttributesExample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/EditorAttributesExample/VB/class1.vb#4)]
